snippet: The Labor Department is scheduled to report on Friday how many jobs were created in December, one day after several surveys showed an improving job market.
abstract: Labor Department reports weekly applications for unemployment benefits dropped to a seasonally adjusted 372,000 in previous week, down 11 percent from same week in 2011; several surveys show an improving job market.
lead_paragraph: The Labor Department is scheduled to report on Friday how many jobs were created in December, one day after several surveys showed an improving job market.

headline.main: Data Indicates Job Market Is Strengthening
headline.print_headline: Data Indicates Job Market Is Strengthening
